channel.title: 约束优化 on
channel.description: Recent content in 约束优化 on

item.title: 06-约束优化问题
item.description: 本章讨论优化问题： $$\begin{array}{rll} \operatorname{minimize} & f(\boldsymbol{x}) \ \text { subject to } & h_i(\boldsymbol{x})=0, \quad i=1, \cdots, m \ & g_j(\boldsymbol{x}) \leqslant 0, \quad j=1, \cdots, p \end{array}$$ 其中, $\boldsymbol{x} \in \mathbb{R}^n, f: \mathbb{R}^n \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, h_i: \mathbb{R}^n \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, g_j: \mathbb{R}^n \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, m \leqslant n$
